case_title: WAJID ALI vs ZAFAR KHALIL, ADVOCATE and another

allegations: Respondents demanded Rs. 77,000 for securing bail for complainant's son.
Respondents failed to secure bail or return the full amount.
Complainant's son was falsely implicated in criminal cases.
facts.money_returned: Rs. 77,000 returned after intervention by elders.

actions_taken: Case referred to Tribunal for final adjudication.

complainant_statement.content: Respondents threatened complainant to compromise the case. Rs. 27,000 paid under duress; Rs. 50,000 still outstanding.

tribunal_findings.costs_imposed: Rs. 25,000 payable equally by respondents to N.-W.F.P. Bar Council

legal_references.act: Legal Practitioners and Bar Councils Act, 1973

legal_references.rules: Legal Practitioners and Bar Councils Rules, 1976

legal_references.case_reference: Muhammad Amin v. M. Asghar Khokhar, Advocate (1992 CLC 1596)
